description:
Summation across each individual activity reported by hours and METs exersion on the Current Physical Activities Questionnire. Estimate of METs comes from the 2011 Compendium fo Physical Activities: Ainsworth BE, Haskell WL, Herrmann SD, Meckes N, Bassett Jr DR, Tudor-Locke C, Greer JL, Vezina J, Whitt-Glover MC, Leon AS. 2011 Compendium of Physical Activities: a second update of codes and MET values. Medicine and Science in Sports and Exercise, 2011;43(8):1575-1581..

Data from this question was collected from 2009 onward.
calculation: (Hours per Week of Walking (from #1)*METs) + (Hours per Week of Activities Reported in Regular Exercise (#4) *METs) + (Hours per Week of Activities Reported in Sports/Recreational Activities (#6)*METs). Since many participants reported the same walking activitiy in more than one section, walking was only included from the walking-specific section.
